options.content:
# LTV Assistant - Retrieval Service Dashboard

Comprehensive monitoring for **hybrid retrieval**, **document search**, **query transformations**, and **workflow performance**.

**Features**: Multi-source retrieval (Qdrant + MySQL) | Dense + Sparse hybrid search | Adaptive loop with sufficiency checks | Small-to-Big enrichment | LLM Provider/Model tracking | Stage-by-stage performance metrics

targets.expr: quantile_over_time(0.50, {service="ltv-assistant-retrieval"} |~ "Query completed" | regexp `(?P<duration>\d+)ms` | unwrap duration [$__interval]) by ()
quantile_over_time(0.95, {service="ltv-assistant-retrieval"} |~ "Query completed" | regexp `(?P<duration>\d+)ms` | unwrap duration [$__interval]) by ()
quantile_over_time(0.99, {service="ltv-assistant-retrieval"} |~ "Query completed" | regexp `(?P<duration>\d+)ms` | unwrap duration [$__interval]) by ()
avg_over_time({service="ltv-assistant-retrieval"} |~ "Query completed" | regexp `(?P<contexts>\d+) contexts` | unwrap contexts [$__interval]) by ()
sum(count_over_time({service="ltv-assistant-retrieval"} |~ "Multi-vector search" | regexp `(?P<children>\d+) children` | unwrap children [$__interval])) by ()
sum(count_over_time({service="ltv-assistant-retrieval"} |~ "Multi-vector search" | regexp `(?P<summaries>\d+) summaries` | unwrap summaries [$__interval])) by ()
sum(count_over_time({service="ltv-assistant-retrieval"} |~ "Multi-vector search" | regexp `(?P<questions>\d+) questions` | unwrap questions [$__interval])) by ()
topk(10, sum by(model, provider) (count_over_time({service="ltv-assistant-retrieval"} |~ "QueryTransformation" | regexp `provider=(?P<provider>\w+) model=(?P<model>[\w-:.]+)` [$__range])))

sum by(main_provider, fallback_provider, type) (count_over_time({service="ltv-assistant-retrieval"} |~ "QueryTransformation.*fallback=triggered" | regexp `type=(?P<type>\w+) main_provider=(?P<main_provider>\w+) .*fallback_provider=(?P<fallback_provider>\w+)` [$__range]))
